info.title: detectAddress example
info.description: This is an API example for detectAddress, a method to detect the type and format of a TON address.

raw_form.description: The raw form of the address

b64.description: The bounceable address in base64 format

b64url.description: The bounceable address in base64url format

b64.description: The non-bounceable address in base64 format

b64url.description: The non-bounceable address in base64url format

given_type.description: The type of the given address

test_only.description: Whether the address is for testnet only
